|brand = WISE TIGER |model = WT-RT8501 |submodelappend = <!-- yes, for space --> |submodel = <!-- SubModel number, Leave blank for unknown --> |revision = v1.2 |subrevision = <!-- Model Subrevision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |model_part_num = |page_start_date = 12/06/2020‎ |page_start_origon = https://wikidevi.wi-cat.ru/WISE_TIGER_WT-RT8501_v1.2 |wlclass = AC1200 |series = <!-- Device series --> |type = wireless router |sernum = <!-- First 4 or so for easy version identification --> |fcc_id = 2AMG8WT-RT8501 |icid = <!-- Industry Canada Identification number, Leave blank for unknown --> |us_id = <!-- US ID number --> |boardid = 800002334 |ecc_id = <!-- eec-id -->
|cpu1chip1 = MediaTek;MT7620A;MT7620A, 1651-BMTH, PTPBYC57H; |cpu1_cores = 1 |cpu1_type = MIPS 24KEc |cpu1_type_rev = <!-- CPU1 type Revision, Leave blank for unknown --> |cpu1spd = 580 <!-- 580 MHz --> |is_doc = |bus = 32-bit
|flash1type = <!-- Parallel,Serial(SPI),NAND,Compact Flash --> |fla1_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla1chip = Macronix;MX25L6433F; |flash1size = 8 MiB <!-- (64 Mib) --> |flash1maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes -->
|ram1type = <!-- DDR,DDR2,DDR3,DDR4 --> |ram1type1 = <!-- SO-DIMM,SDRAM --> |ram1spd = <!-- RAM speed --> |ram1size = 64 MiB <!-- (512 Mib) --> |ram1chip = Winbond;W9751G6KB-25; |ram1_num = <!-- Number of Ram chips --> |nvramsize = <!-- 32, 60, 64, etc... in kb, Leave blank for unknown -->

|bootwait = <!-- On or Off, Leave blank for unknown --> |stockbootloader = U-Boot;1.1.3;; |stockos = OpenWRT;r15179 (modified);;
|exp_if_types = <!-- Expansion Interface types, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sim_num = <!-- Number of sim Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_pcmcia_num = <!-- Number of pcmcia ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_expcard_num = <!-- Number of Expresscard ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_minipci_num = <!-- Number of Mini PCI Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_minipcie_num = <!-- Number of Mini PCIexpress Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_usb_num = <!-- Number of USB Ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_cf_num = <!-- Number Compact Flash Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sdmmc_num = <!-- Number SD/MMC Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_ide_num = <!-- Number of ide ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_ata_num = <!-- Number of ATA Ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sata_num = <!-- Number of sata ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_esata_num = <!-- Number of esata ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_parallel = <!-- Number of parallel ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sfp_num = <!-- Number of sfp ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_M.2 = <!-- Number of M.2 ports, Leave blank for none --> |usb_hub = <!-- USB hub compatibility -->
|pwr_volt_type = VDC |pwr_vdc = 12 |pwr_amp_dc = 1.5 |pwr_conn = barrel |pwr_barrel_outer = <!-- Outer barrel size in mm --> |pwr_barrel_inner = <!-- Inner barrel size in mm --> |pwr_barrel_len = <!-- Length of barrel --> |pwr_pol = <!-- Connector polarity -->
|serial = <!-- Full Serial info --> |jtag = <!-- Full JTAG info -->
|specialfeat = <!-- Features that don't fit any place else, Leave blank for none --> |flags = <!-- flags, Leave blank for none --> |addchip = <!-- Additional Chips --> |802dot11_protocols = abgn+ac
|defaulip = 192.168.0.1 |defaultlogin = <!-- default Login Name, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultpass = admin |defaultssid = WIFI-XXXX, WIFI-XXXX-5G |defaultssid_regex = |default_ch = <!-- Defaults channel(s) Radio(s) are set to --> |manuf = EDUP |manuf_model = EP-2655 |manuf_rev = <!-- Manufacturer Revision --> |is_manuf = No |tpfirmware = <!-- Third party firmware official support, AsusWRT-Merlin, CeroWrt, DD-WRT, DD-WRT (kong), DD-WRT (kongac), DD-WRT (kongarm), FreedomBox, FreshTomato-ARM, Gargoyle, LibreWrt, Oleg (wl500g), Oleg-ng (wl500g), OpenWrt, Tomato, Tomato RAF, Tomato (shibby), Tomato (Toastman), TomatoUSB, Wive-NG -->
|availability = <!-- Market availability --> |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |fccapprovdate = 09/11/2017 |estreldate = <!-- Estimated release date --> |estprice = <!-- Estimated retail price in US dollars --> |upc = <!-- UPC number --> |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = <!-- newegg item number --> |asin = B07CWVR1KH |asin_country = <!-- ASIN country --> |asin2 = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |countrymanuf = China

|wi1_if_name = |rad1chip1cpu = true |rad1oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad1_ant_conn = <!-- Leave blank for unknown --> |rad1txchains = 2 |rad1rxchains = 2 |rad1sstreams = 2 |rad1stand = IEEE 802.11b/g/n |nqam1 = <!-- 600, 800, 900, 1000, --> |rad1n = 300 |rad1g = 54 |rad1b = 11 |rad1freq = 2.4
|wi2_if_name = |rad2chip1 = MediaTek;MT7612E;MT7612EN, 1803-BMAL, ETPH3R23; |rad2oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad2_ant_conn = <!-- Leave blank for unknown --> |rad2txchains = 2 |rad2rxchains = 2 |rad2sstreams = 2 |rad2stand = IEEE 802.11a/n/ac |rad2ac = 867 |nqam2 = <!-- 600, 800, 900, 1000, --> |rad2n = 300 |rad2a = 54 |rad2freq = 5
}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== "800002334 V1.2" is silkscreened on the board.
Sold under the same name as [[WISE TIGER WT-RT8501|version 1.0]], but markings on the board and MediaTek chipsets are distinct, as well as possible differences in flash memory and RAM.
According to the [https://fccid.io/2AMG8WT-RT8501/Letter/Differences-Description-3555053 Differences Description] document on the FCC, the following models are identical: * EDUP EP-2655 * EDUPLINK EPLINK-9001 * Card King KW-RT6019 * WISE TIGER WT-RT8501
==See also== :[http://www.wise-tiger.com/English/Products/Mobileparts/ Wireless Adapters] • [[EDUP Wireless Adapters]] *[[WISE TIGER WT-RT8501]] - AC1200 Dual Band Wireless Router *[[WISE TIGER WT-AC9008]] - AC1300 Wireless USB Adapters • B01LH0JGP6 *[[WISE TIGER WT-P9008]] - AC1200 Wireless USB Adapters • B07CBYY1GH :[[Realtek]] RTL8812BU *[[WISE TIGER WT-AC9006]] - AC600 Wireless USB Adapters • B01M0Q51UI :[[Realtek]] RTL8811AU • [[EDUP EP-AC1607]] (AC600 • B077HTXG4R) :Driver: http://www.wise-tiger.com/dl/rtl8811AU/linux.zip <!-- *01.Windows Driver （for Windows XP、Vista、Windows 7、Windows 8、Windows 8.1） :http://www.wise-tiger.com/dl/rtl8811AU/8811AU.rar *02.Windows Driver (for Windows 10) :http://www.wise-tiger.com/dl/rtl8811AU/8811winds10%20.zip *03. Linux Driver； :http://www.wise-tiger.com/dl/rtl8811AU/linux.zip *04.Mac Driver （for Mac OSX 10.6-10.8）； :http://www.wise-tiger.com/dl/rtl8811AU/mac(mac10.6,mac10.7,mac10.8).zip *05.Mac Driver （for Mac OSX 10.9-10.10）； :http://www.wise-tiger.com/dl/rtl8811AU/mac(mac10.9,mac10.10).zip *06.Mac Driver (for 10.11): :http://www.wise-tiger.com/dl/rtlmac10.6-10.11.zip *07.Mac Driver (for 10.12) :http://www.wise-tiger.com/dl/mac10.12.zip --> *[[WISE TIGER WT-WA9003]] - N300 Wireless USB Adapters • :[[Realtek]] RTL8192CU • [[EDUP EP-9503]] (SU ?) :Driver: http://www.wise-tiger.com/dl/rtl8192cu/linux.rar *[[EDUP ED-MS1559]] - N300 Wireless USB Adapters • B00KV9TQXM :http://www.szedup.com/support/driver-download/ep-ms1559-driver/ *[[EDUP EP-N8553]] - N150 Wireless USB Adapters • B018Z5GUZA :Model: FBA EP-N8553: http://www.szedup.com/?s=8553
